name: JUMP MASTER (jamie_S)
description:
make your way to the top of the level in this rage educing game with cute graphics that completely contradict the essence of the game. Play as a character who shoots himself into the air by absolutely blasting himself upwards with explosives. he can also grab onto walls to climb all the way to the top.

play with checkpoints or play without checkpoints if you really want to have a bad time.

 scores are saved locally - no online leader boards.
